content.text:
# List of archaeological sites in Whitchurch–Stouffville

This is a list of archaeological sites in Whitchurch–Stouffville, Ontario, Canada: Both the Trent University Site Designation number and the Borden System archaeological designations are given.
Late Ontario Iroquois (1400 AD - 1650 AD)
* Aurora (or Old Fort) Site (7Yk27; BaGu-27); 3.4 ha
** Location: Lots 14 and 15, Concession 6, West half. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=44%C2%B000%2720.3%22N+79%C2%B020%2719.1%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&sll=44.006278,-79.335306&sspn=0.054018,0.077162&gl=ca&t=m&z=17  44°00'N 79°20'W]
** Date: 1550-1600 AD
* Aurora Isolated Site (7Yk24; BaGu-11)
** Location: Lot 15, Concession 6, West half. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=44%C2%B000%2722.6%22N+79%C2%B020%2707.1%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&sll=44.004453,-79.338005&sspn=0.013505,0.01929&gl=ca&t=m&z=14  44°00'N 79°20'W]
* Chalk Site (7Yk20; BaGu-8)
** Location: Lot 16, Concession 4, East half. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=44%C2%B000%2730.3%22N+79%C2%B020%2743.2%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&sll=44.005639,-79.338639&sspn=0.006752,0.009645&gl=ca&t=m&z=14  44°00'N 79°22'W]
* Clark Lake Site (7Yk23; BaGu-10)
** Location: Lot 14, Concession 5, East half. Entrance:  [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=44%C2%B000%2708.7%22N+79%C2%B020%2727.9%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&ll=44.0024,-79.341073&spn=0.013505,0.01929&sll=43.992969,-79.382508&sspn=0.013508,0.01929&gl=ca&t=m&z=16  44°00'N 79°20'W]
* Foote Site (7Yk26; AlGt-158)
** Location: East side of McCowan Road, north of Stouffville Road. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=43%C2%B057%2758.4%22N+79%C2%B018%2701.8%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&sll=44.008417,-79.345333&sspn=0.054016,0.077162&gl=ca&t=m&z=16  43°57'N 79°18'W]
* Horton-Devins Site (7Yk22; BaGu-9)
** Location: East of Warden Avenue, north of Vandorf Sideroad. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=44%C2%B001%2702.6%22N+79%C2%B020%2720.7%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&sll=43.966222,-79.3005&sspn=0.013514,0.01929&gl=ca&t=m&z=17  44°01'N 79°20'W]
* Hoshel-Huntly Site (7Yk21; AlGu-15)
** Location: West of Warden Avenue, on the south side of Vandorf Sideroad. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=44%C2%B000%2703.8%22N+79%C2%B022%2704%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&sll=44.017389,-79.339083&sspn=0.006751,0.009645&gl=ca&t=m&z=16  44°00'N 79°22'W]
* Mantle Site (AlGt-334); 4.2 ha; 90% excavated
** Location: Immediately west of Byers Pond Way, and south-west of Lost Pond Crescent. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=43%C2%B057%2749.9%22N+79%C2%B014%2712%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&sll=44.001056,-79.367778&sspn=0.013506,0.01929&gl=ca&t=m&z=17  43°57'49.9"N 79°14'12"W]
** Date: 1500-1550 AD
* Preston Site (7Yk18; AlGu-9)
** Location: Lot 13, Concession 4, West half.  [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=43%C2%B059%2734.7%22N+79%C2%B022%2757%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&ll=43.992969,-79.382508&spn=0.013508,0.01929&sll=43.991657,-79.383795&sspn=0.013508,0.01929&gl=ca&t=m&z=16  43°59'N 79°22'W]
* Ratcliff (or Radcliffe) Site (7Yk25; AlGt-157); 2.8 ha
** Location: Lot 9, Concession 8, West half. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=43%C2%B059%2742.4%22N+79%C2%B016%2756%22W&ie=UTF8&hnear=0x89d52e9a36911b51:0x5cbfd9bb56678c8d,43%C2%B059%2742.4%22N+79%C2%B016%2756%22W&gl=ca&t=m&z=16  43°59'N 79°W]
** Date: 1550-1600 AD
* Van Nostrand-Wright (or Vandorf) Site (7Yk19; A1Gu-13); 4.3 ha; limited excavation
** Location: Lots 14 and 15, Concession 4, West half; overlooking Van Nostrand Lake to the north-east. [https://maps.google.ca/maps?q=43%C2%B059%2741.3%22N+79%C2%B023%2711.5%22W&hl=en&ie=UTF8&sll=43.995111,-79.282222&sspn=0.013507,0.01929&gl=ca&t=m&z=16  43°59'N 79°23'W]
** Date: 1550-1600 AD
See also
* Whitchurch–Stouffville
* Draper Site, Pickering, Ontario
References
